about_the_game:
Welcome to your new government-mandated life as an essential worker! In this role you will enjoy such benefits as: restocking food, restocking drinks, and the exercise gained by avoiding a crippling virus!

In this game you will manage your food, family, and gas, all while the threat of paying rent looms over your head. After your long work day, you will make choices that will help (or hinder) you the next day. Do not let your health, or the health of your family, fall by the wayside.

We cannot wait to work with you!


FEATURES:

-Alternative Controls allowing the game to be played with just a mouse

-2D pixel art graphics and videos

-Never ending work with little to no compensation

-Easy to follow objective and tight gameplay loop

-Character progression

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel or AMD Dual Core CPU
  • Graphics: (Integrated): Intel HD Graphics or AMD (formerly ATI) Radeon HD Graphics (Discrete): Nvidia GeForce 9600 GT or AMD Radeon HD 2400
  • DirectX: Version 9.0

  • Additional Notes: 512 MB RAM

short_description: A casual, cartoony, money-management game set during a terrifying pandemic. Race to restock shelves before customers leave unfulfilled; all while avoiding sick people along the way.
